text: @BorisJohnson suggestion - repeal all Covid-19 legislation - treat areas where it starts up with lockdowns - the whole country doesn’t need to be treated like it’s everywhere. It isn’t. People should stay in their own counties. Police to stop people crossing into counties and test them for C19
